#include "shardkv_rpc.h"

namespace janus {

class TxLogServer;
class ShardKvServer;
class ShardKvServiceImpl : public ShardKvService {
 public:
  shared_ptr<ShardKvServer> sp_svr_{nullptr};
  ShardKvServiceImpl() {}
   


  void Put(const uint64_t& op_id, 
           const string& k,
           const string& v,
           const shardid_t& shard,
           uint32_t* ret,
           rrr::DeferredReply* defer) override;



  void Append(const uint64_t& op_id, 
              const string& k,
              const string& v,
              const shardid_t& shard,
              uint32_t* ret,
              rrr::DeferredReply* defer) override;



  void Get(const uint64_t& op_id, 
           const string& k,
           const shardid_t& shard,
           uint32_t* ret,
           string* v,
           rrr::DeferredReply* defer) override;

};

} // namespace janus
